channel.title: Run serve help
channel.description:
Ok hey i recently picked the source: Silab garza v6, heres what i edited it to:@echo off color 0a title SilabGarza v6 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
When i run it says: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
i got java 6.7 platinum version i think.. if you can help i would really appreciate it ;)

item.title: Run serve help
item.dc:creator: @ownager55 ownager55
item.description:
@ownager55 wrote:

Ok hey i recently picked the source: Silab garza v6, heres what i edited it to:@echo off
color 0a
title SilabGarza v6
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

When i run it says: ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

i got java 6.7 platinum version i think… if you can help i would really appreciate it
